metadata.title: CVE-2018-19206 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: steps/mail/func.inc in Roundcube before 1.3.8 has XSS via crafted use of<svg><style>, as demonstrated by an onload attribute in a BODY element,within an HTML attachment.

criterions.comment: roundcube: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
